event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: No repair action is recommended at this time.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The Solaris Fault Manager has determined that the number of correctable errors against a particular CPU's cache index and way exceeds recommended limts.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: The Message ID: <tt>%MSGID%</tt> indicates a problem in the CPU's cache subsystem although no repair action is needed at this time. No data has been lost. If and when the Solaris Fault Manager determines that there is sufficient cause, service action will be recommended at that time.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The performace of the system may be minimally impacted as a result of removing the cache line and way from service. Loss of service will be limited to this CPU's cache line and way.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: The system will attempt to remove the CPU's offending cache index and way from service.
event_registry_properties.name: title
